website_summaries.verdict: With a USB plug-in, this electric pencil sharpener is great for an office desktop.
pros: Includes a USB hookup for power to plug into your laptop
Also has a wall charger adapter and can operate on batteries
Gentle enough to work on colored pencils
Auto-stop when your pencil is done sharpening
cons: Some users complained that the sharpener quit working after just a few weeks of use

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: Returned item, stopped working 2 days after I received it. Update: The company kindly reached out to me and sent a new sharpener free of charge. We've now had it for a few days and has been working. The sharpener leaves a nice, even point on all sides of the pencil.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: This HIGH SCHOOL TEACHER LOVES this sharpener!
customer_reviews.text: Just started using this sharpener in my classroom and it's FABULOUS! No more guessing as to if the pencil is sharp. It ends the constant "grind, look, repeat" process we teachers endure. It stops when the pencil is sharp, and boy do I mean SHARP! I have heard quieter sharpeners, but this one is not any louder than the others I've heard. I've been extremely pleased with this purchase. EXPLANATION OF ATTACHED PHOTO: A customer just asked a question about purchasing an adapter replacement for one that was accidentally destroyed. I thought a photo of the adapter's information might be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Worked well...for 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my class of only 7 students. This pencil sharpener worked great for about 2 weeks, but today, it will not turn on or sharpen any pencils. I am so frustrated. I had to buy this pencil sharpener with my own money, and now I do not have the money to buy another one. How is it so hard to make a pencil sharpener that lasts? :(
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Medford

customer_reviews.title: (I have it nicely tucked away behind my phone) not a bulky piece ...
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't quite call it heavy duty but it does the trick for single user who occasionally sharpens pencils throughout the day. Not too big, (I have it nicely tucked away behind my phone) not a bulky piece taking up desk space.
customer_reviews.author: Katheleen Lanzetti

customer_reviews.title: Flexible Power
customer_reviews.text: I like the flexibility of three different types of power. At this time I have used only 120 AC but plan to supply it with batteries as soon as I purchase them. I have had a similar pencil sharpener on my desk for more than 20 years and replaced it only because I didn't replace the batteries soon enough. It works well
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!!! TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pencil sharpener goes against everything that it is advertised to do. It's Terribly Loud. Very cheap Quality. You have to hold on to it while sharpening a pencil because you have to push down very hard on the pencil to get the sharpener to work, and you also have to hold on to the pencil tightly or the pencil just spins. This sharpener does not stop when the pencil is sharpened. It's stops because you have to push down on the pencil so hard that it runs and then it stops. Worst Quality pencil sharpener I've ever used. I only gave 1 star so I could leave a review. DO NOT RECOMMEND FOR ANYONE!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy The OneTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't produce worse sharpner if you try!
customer_reviews.text: Was able to sharpen 10 of 20 pencils, and even that with difficulty. Most of the time the sharpener didn't detect the pencil. But even when it did, the motor kept starting and stopping with jittery rotation. I couldn't produce a product this bad if I tried!
customer_reviews.author: misa

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working only after a couple of uses
customer_reviews.text: The hole on the device you put the plug UTI isn’t working and I just bought it 40 days ago and have only used it a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: LISA W.

customer_reviews.title: Works great at home or on the go !
customer_reviews.text: 32 years old and I'm back in collage. I use this sharpner Daily ! It does great every time.... It mainly stays plugged into the wall by much laptop. However on large assignments I take it right along with me. The battery use is awesome.... But the USB plug is to perfect for sharpening on the go lol Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Died after one and a half months
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars, I would. Ordered over the summer for my kids for school. We home school. They used it minimally over the summer and it seemed fine. Two weeks into school and it started needing "coaxing" for the motor to get going. We had to put a pencil in and turn it ourselves and the mirror would start and stop a few times but finally go enough to sharpen pencils. It is now the middle of October and the thing is dead. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Avrilana

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, efficient and fast
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for my needs. I MUST have pinpoint sharp tips on red/blue pencil for medical use....this give me exactly what I need. It also can be plugged in or run on batteries...very useful when one does not want another outlet used.
customer_reviews.author: sbarbara

customer_reviews.title: Broke on my third time using it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First got this and I was in love with it. First time around got my pencils perfectly sharp. After the third time using this sharpener it breaks. I was so disappointed that it wasn’t as durable as much as I would’ve liked for it to be. Maybe I just over used it all at once. But it shouldn’t have broken this quick.
customer_reviews.author: BossyBrina

customer_reviews.title: Sharpens well
customer_reviews.text: Sharpens well, but give 1 thumbs up cuz of no auto stop. Updated to 5 star review. Company reached out and offered to make it right. As promised my 5 star sharpener w/auto stop arrived today. Responsivenesss to customer concerns = customer satisfaction + loyalty to brand.
customer_reviews.author: AJ's granny

customer_reviews.title: JARLINK  Electric Pencil sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I want to clarify WHY I feel one star is all this sharpener should get - it is so CHEAPLY MADE - there is NO possible way you can clean this after daily use - and you MUST CLEAN it out since the receptical is VERY SMALL - holds very little pencil shavings but; you cannot get behind the blade unit without causing an injury. Amazon - your standards are higher than having items bring down your name because the PRODUCT is low quality. An injury can easily happen trying to clean it PROPERLY!
customer_reviews.author: Tshop123Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: AC or Batteries and prefect sharpening
customer_reviews.text: I love that it takes batteries on works on wall power and that it only sharpens pencils until the are sharp and then stops.
customer_reviews.author: Erik G

customer_reviews.title: It's good but it's loud. Sharpens pencils right to the top!
customer_reviews.text: It works but it's VERY loud and a little slow. I literally have to wear noise canceling headphones when sharpening pencils for the first time, although it's better when sharpening already used pencils.
customer_reviews.author: Syed

customer_reviews.title: ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love this pencil sharpener! I tried a few before I hit this one and I wish I had started with this one! So easy to use. Sharpens perfectly. Stops when sharp. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Zonafan

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months. Spend a few dollars more for X-acto or Bostitch.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughters to sharpen their pencils. After less than 4 months of light use, it died. I took the blade assembly out, cleaned it, and made sure pencil lead was not jamming it. I think whatever is used as a microswitch is not working. If press in a pencil and jam it just right at an angle, it might make contact for a second and the motor will turn on. I think I will look for a name-brand sharpener with a worthwhile warranty rather than this cheap mass-produced knock-off. They are only a few dollars more, are beefy with big motors, and have 7-10 year warranties. This one is a toy.
customer_reviews.author: CM477

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pencil sharpener for an after-school program of over 50+ kids and it was worth every penny! It does it job well. We don't over use it but it has met it's purpose. Definitely recommend for a classroom or office space.
customer_reviews.author: Rhianna V.

customer_reviews.title: LASTED ONLY 2 MONTHS!
customer_reviews.text: A pencil lead tip broke off and got caught (like they do in all sharpeners), which it rendered it useless. We took off the top and removed the piece of lead, but when we put the top back on, the pencil sharpener no longer worked! Several adults tried to fix it, but to no avail!
customer_reviews.author: Kym Brunner

customer_reviews.title: home pencil sharpener
customer_reviews.text: It's not a heavy duty pencil sharpener but for home it's good
customer_reviews.author: Linda W

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good price, good results
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I really bought this as a cheap alternative to a bigger size sharpener. Was not expecting to be satisfied with it when I took it out of the box. I tried it on a few different types of pencils and I have to say Ive been pretty Impressed by it's performance and end result every time I've used it. Size is nice and portable with plenty of space for the amount of waste I generate. Auto stop is a nice feature to achieve the perfect tip. Though it can be abit too agressive if you have pencils with crappy wood/graphite. Very satisfied with purchased!
customer_reviews.author: buzz lightyear

customer_reviews.title: Great home or office sharpener.
customer_reviews.text: Pencil sharpener works great for kids school pencils and colored pencils comes with a USB cord to plug in ,works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good pencil sharpener!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter, an elementary schooler, writes and draws a lot, really very very much. We need to use pencil sharpener a lot and very often. She needs to use it almost every day, sometimes sharpening a whole box of colorful pencils or regular pencils, kinda every other day or every three days. We always want an easy but strong pencil sharpener. This one is just what we want. She used it and loves it. I just sharpened a whole big boxes of colorful pencils for her. This sharpener is really amazing, highly efficient and stable. It seems this is the best pencil sharpener we have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: elshmm

customer_reviews.title: power source
customer_reviews.text: I wanted battery operated. We put batteries in but it did not work It only worked when plugged into electric outlet. I do not have electrical outlet easily available near desk. Thank you, Ginny Kemmerer
customer_reviews.author: Girvinia

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.  Not the most powerful, and makes a very LONG point.
customer_reviews.text: As per the title. The motor / gear system does not give the most power to the rotating blades-- it will stop turning if the pencil is inserted with too much pressure. But it is fine, you can back off a bit and it proceeds to grind. It also gives a very curiously long point. I will attach a photo comparing the factory point of a Dixon Ticonderoga #2, with the JARLINK point. The difference is remarkable. In my opinion (and my experience with 0.5mm mechanical pencils) such a long, tapered point is more prone to breaking.
customer_reviews.author: amazon_princessTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Don't overuse it
customer_reviews.text: I find the best thing to do is let the sharpeners rest a while, just like the heavy duty micro shredders that we use...they shut off automatically when they are overheated so as not to damage the internal motor. The sharpeners of course do not have auto shut-off, so we need to use good judgement. You can't expect something fairly cheap to last avery long after constantly sharpening 50+ pencils. If longevity of the product doesn't matter to you, then sharpen away! I like this sharpener, it works as described, and sharpens very well. Can't beat it for the price, and I like that it doesn't rust.
customer_reviews.author: Serious Shopper

customer_reviews.title: JUST GOT IT TODAY, AND IT'S GOING BACK TODAY!
customer_reviews.text: The features it claims to have DO NOT WORK properly: - There's no auto stop on this thing. It just keeps sharpening and basically eating your pencils really fast. Even when the tip of the pencil is already broken. - It broke every one of my pencil tips, and it did not exclude them automatically like it claims to do. I had to take the thing apart to get the broken tips out every time. - It doesn't sharpen evenly. All my tips came out with wood still on one side, no matter which way I turned the pencil to try and remedy the problem. ABSOLUTELY FRUSTRATING!
customer_reviews.author: Alma W.

customer_reviews.title: Great until it wasn’t...
customer_reviews.text: It was the best sharpener we ever owned....for the two weeks before the charger stopped working. :(
customer_reviews.author: L. S.

customer_reviews.title: Company sent a 2nd sharpener after first broke in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: 1st Review: Broke in 2 weeks. Will not sharpen. Waste of money. Will not let me return it. Updated review: I'm updating my review because the company reached out and sent us a new sharpener. I appreciate that the company made it right. Hopefully the first one was a fluke. A week in and this one still works. I'll keep you posted.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 6 months of light adult use
customer_reviews.text: We're retirees so this sharpener saw VERY light duty. Purchased in July, but when I went to sharpen a pencil in December it was broken. Pretty simple design, but it no longer "sensed" when a pencil was inserted into the sharpener. Up till that moment, I'd have given it a very high rating, but to not even last 6 month under very, very light use is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Work's great but do not connect it to your computer
customer_reviews.text: Work's great but do not connect it to your computer. I just connected to the USB in my computer and it burned the USB port and broke the keyboard and the mouse which was integrated into main board. So be careful! Use it just with the adapter and plug it just to the circuit 120V do not use it with USB!!! I'm lucky that my PC is on a warranty, but anyway I have been sending it from Chicago to Texas to HP service center. It's a sucks
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: Good for students
customer_reviews.text: Edit: after reviewing my first one and having issues with it jamming..they sent me a new one and doesn’t get jammed as bad. I wouldn’t recommend for an artist that sharpens a lot like myself because you do have to take the extra time after every few pencils to clean off the pencil shavings to avoid jamming but this sharpener would be good for just a basic pencil sharpen every now and then.
customer_reviews.author: Andriana

customer_reviews.title: Because Zero Stars Was Not an Option, But Great Return Policy
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, overpriced, and did not work. Grateful for the return policy. I was not previously familiar with the "Jarlink" brand, and the reason for that is now clear. Even if the sharpener had worked the entire device could not have be more cheaply made. It would only have been a matter of days or weeks and it would have broken with ordinary use. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: It lasted 18 months for our household --- Now working again.!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE - 6/4/2020 So I'm updating my review. Few days after my previous review, I gave the sharpener a few "whacks" thinking maybe something was stuck. Anyway, I have no idea, but it's working like a charm now. Ha!! We use the sharpener just a couple of times a week, so it's not heavily used. ================================== The sharpener lasted 18 months. I think I ruined it by using it to sharpening an eyeliner pencil :O I am not sure. I bought this for the house, 2 young elementary kids and I was happy with it. I would buy again, but I will check other products.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Cat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pencil point every time!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gone through a lot of electric pencil sharpener‘s being a homeschool teacher of nine. This one seems to not only hold up to the rigors of high use but also consistently sharpens to a perfect point. I like that it has an automatic endpoint to prevent over sharpening. I also like that the access to dispose shavings it’s easy. Pop off the lid and dump it out compared to a drawer that tends to leave shavings crammed in the back. I also like that it’s footprint is small no bigger than a water cup. And I like that the insert for the pencil is located at the top compared to the front.
customer_reviews.author: A. Daley

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was magical! The best pencil sharpener I’d ever had... it lasted a week on my desk, and I only use high quality pencils. Now you insert the pencil and nothing happens. Update: I requested a replacement from amazon. My replacement arrived today, and doesn’t work from fresh out of the box. Major disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: DandelionHappy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, short-lived junk
customer_reviews.text: We have had this pencil sharpener for 14 months and it's toast. As kiddos are schooling at home right now, an unexpectedly nonfunctional pencil sharpener is itself a crisis. My parents are still using the same pencil sharpener that I used as a child, 25+ years ago. If that didn't make me sound approximately 1000 years old, I'll just add: they sure don't make them like they used to. The cheap plastic that is used on the housing of the blade wore out and it is no longer engaging with the motor shaft from the base. Move on to a more reputable brand.
customer_reviews.author: OhKFish

customer_reviews.title: Happily use for Prisma color pencils.
customer_reviews.text: It's such a breeze to use this sharpener. A bit above my budget but so far it's worth it. I am trying to avoid the battery operated ones because it could be bad for the environment. This one you can plug in and go ( optional battery operation as well). I also like how compact this one is, not bulky like those usually seen in offices. The only tiny thing that could be added is maybe a brush for occasionally clean out the shaving bits that trapped behind those blades? All and all, very happy. Let's see how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: A buyer from SF

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT HEAVY DUTY... nope.
customer_reviews.text: The description is a lie. I hate when companies do this... They should have just said it was a normal pencil sharpener. It's very light weight and janky... Not sturdy, and struggles to sharpen the pencils. I thought it would be great to have one that can plug right into USB. That should have given it away that it was not hard core... I am a school teacher and have had Heavy Duty pencil sharpeners. THIS IS NOT HEAVY DUTY! That being said, it did sharpen my pencil with a fine tip; thus the 3 starts.
customer_reviews.author: Keaokun

customer_reviews.title: Great little sharpener!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pencil sharpener! It runs off USB so you don't blow through batteries or lose power due to low batteries. It sharpens all the way around evenly and it shuts off once the pencil is sharp. My only qualm is that the hole isn't very big and i have a hard time sharpening my colored pencils that are shaped like a triangle. It works perfectly for regular sizes pencils though and with a little finagling, I can get the triangular ones sharpened. I have been using it religiously for months and it hasn't let me down yet. Would recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! We read all of the reviews and we’re convinced that this will be a good one for us. As in a homeschooling parent knows, a good pencil sharpener is worth it’s weight in gold! So glad we bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Sharpens pencils well but the entire device is made cheaply
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product on 9/22/19 as a back-to-school tool that our son could use to keep his pencils sharpened. It does that job really well but after using it for a month in a half the plug input on the device got pushed in so when we try to plug the cord into the sharpener it doesn't make a connection which means we are not able to plug the device into the wall and that we have to use batteries to power the sharpener. We're 15 days over the return date so we either have to choose to spend money on batteries forever or buy another device which is pretty disappointing. I wouldn't suggest someone buying this.
customer_reviews.author: robert maculloch

customer_reviews.title: It can use batteries after all,
customer_reviews.text: I thought it could not use batteries but as I was about to pack it up to return it, I noticed a latch on the bottom to open a battery compartment. There was no mention of that in the instructions and it seems like they need to be be inserted in the opposite way that batteries are inserted, It's a good product but it needs MUCH better instructions.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Dangerously Sharp Pencils
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a new pencil sharpener to replace your old one, this is THE ONE! BUT! If you’re a teacher like me, this will not sharpen your fat Ticonderoga pencils in your classroom. Which is fine, I knew that ahead of time and so when I placed my first unsharpened pencil into this thing, BOY WAS I SURPRISED to see the most dangerous pencil ever!! Putting it together was simple since it came as 3 parts: sharpener, Ford, and wall plug. Very simple and pencil sharpens if you push it down enough but it sharpens very quickly!!! Extremely sharp pencils but I’m okay with that!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: This electronic pencil sharpener is an excellent product. My kids often use pencils to do their homework so this product makes our life much easier. This product is as advertised. It comes in a sturdy box so that it does not get broken in transit. It was perfect size. It fits right on my desk at home and does not take up a lot of unnecessary space. You can either use the plug that is included with it or 4 AA batteries to make it more portable. It sharpens pencils very quickly and is easy to clean when it gets full. I would recommend this product and purchase more products from this seller in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amethyst Storey

customer_reviews.title: Initially Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: Just received this sharpener right on time. Well protected for shipping. I put the correct batteries in but not sure of placement. Did not see any written directions on how to install. Nice to have the ability to plug it in the wall too. So that is what i did. Instruction say not to sharpen wax pencils but i did not see this on the Amazon page. This is important for customers to know. Will update this review as i use the sharpener more. Well it has stopped working on second day. Got a refund from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: D. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Straight to the Point
customer_reviews.text: A good pencil sharpener gives you a sharp point withouth have to shave away lots of wood. This JARLINK Electric Pencil Sharpener does a fantastic job of giving you a pencil with a crisp, tight writing tip. The helical blades shave away quickly, so you don't waste a lot of pencil getting the lead sharp. Another great feature is you can use it plugged in, which we do, or run off battery power. Finally, it is easy to open and clean out the shavings, without making a mess.
customer_reviews.author: A. Silverstone

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: So, we have had this one day and well, it is not so great. Very cheaply made and not very powerful plugged in and especially if you use batteries (very weak). The motor is just not consistent. It sharpens kinda ok, but with an odd thin long point. But again, seems to be made of cheap lightweight plastic, motor is weak, blades are below avg, etc etc etc. It is NOT heavy duty at all. Do not have high hopes this will last long with the kids and the family. It is a nice size though. Overall, a tad disappointed... you get what you pay for. Exacto's are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Risa C. Vandermark

customer_reviews.title: Sharpens pencils - can be hard to open/close
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when the package I received included an AC-DC power supply - I had thought this was only battery powered. The device works great - sharpens pencils as you would expect. The only thing I don't like about it is that the top is quite difficult to put on after it's removed (and sometimes is hard to remove as well). This is probably due to the tight fit of the top - definitely wouldn't stop me from buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Emrys E. Maier

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: Its okay but the fact that I have to plug it in is a hassle. I had a cheaper one that took batteries before, and it lasted for 10-15 years and was MUCH more convenient if I needed to carry it up or down stairs to another room. It does get pencils sharp and cleaning is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Cardinal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My kids and I have sharpened about 50 pencils/colored pencils with this and it's still working. It makes them really sharp too. It is easy to remove the sharpening's too with a simple twist. I also like how you can either plug it in or use batteries. So far, we've only plugged it in. The only thing is that I wished out of it was that it was more heavy at the bottom so it didn't move sometimes while sharpening.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Great for Price
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pencil sharpener for a couple of months now and it has been very reliable and resilient. I am a teacher and my students use this pencil sharpener all day, everyday. It is easy to empty and can withstand a great deal of use and handling. I would highly recommend this sharpener for anybody who needs an electric sharpener for a reasonable price. I will purchase this product again once my students finally wear this one out. :)
customer_reviews.author: BookLover4Life

customer_reviews.title: working well for 2 kids distance learning and 2 adults working from home.
customer_reviews.text: Tried a different battery operated pencil sharpener but the teeth seemed to clog with shavings. This one does a much better job whether using the batteries or plugged in. It has a smart design, the vertical orientation with sloped cutting base pushes the shavings away from the cutter. It is quick, gives a sharp point with an even removal. There are 4 of us using it on an occasional basis and haven't experienced any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Not Your Coach

customer_reviews.title: It works and it sharpens to a fine tip
customer_reviews.text: So many mixed reviews. I was hesitant to buy. Sharpened one new pencil to an extra fine tip; automatically stopping when done. Sharpened one used color and one used normal pencil to a fine tip; auto shut off. The conical tip of the shaved wood is not uniform (the peel is higher/lower in some areas), but I don't see that as being a problem. Both photos show the pencils being sharpened with batteries, not DC, so that you can see that the battery power is sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Simple, efficient and powerful!
customer_reviews.text: This pencil sharpener is absolutely perfect in so many ways. First and foremost, it does its job sharpening pencils quickly, quietly and with minimal noise. The battery-powered option is extra convenient, as well, simply because it is just one less cord in the way. It will blend right in perfectly with just about any office/desk setup.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Derk

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: This pencil sharpener doesn't work that well. Sharpens unevenly. It also doesn't turn off when pencil is so called sharpened. It's also hard to put back together after emptying shavings catcher. Disappointed. Wasted money. I dislike giving bad reviews but truth wills out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's fine
customer_reviews.text: This was smaller than expected, but that's probably because it's just smaller than the other one we have. The lid to empty is kind of a hassle to get off and back on again. I definitely can't have my children use it on their own simply because the lack of ease. It sharpens the tips extra long. Very strange. I also with there was an auto shutoff when the pencil is done sharpening. It works, but it's basic.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Flowers

customer_reviews.title: unuseable pencil sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I used this product one time to sharpen a dozen pencils. It worked just fine the one time it was used. I attempted to sharpen a pencil this morning and it did not work. I checked the adapter plug, replaced the batteries to no avail. I know it is past the return date but I fully expected your product to last more than one use. Very disappointed with this product and I will not purchase from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Randall A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter who loves to color and needed a good sharpener for her colored pencils and school pencils. After using this for only 3 months ( and honestly not daily) maybe once a week, this item broke. Just stopped working. I tried cleaning it but the power just stopped. I tried different power sources and nothing. I have updated my review because although I had an issue, the company reached out and made it right. Great customer service goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works really well (esp. if you like super fine tips)
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - leaves a sharp cut - works well on battery and AC power - takes removable batteries (longevity) - lightweight and shaving-tight: good for travel Cons - Pencils are *very* sharp, perhaps too sharp for some coloring pencils - While it can be run via USB, you need a non-standard cable and charger to do it. Having a micro USB or USB-C would have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Imler

customer_reviews.title: Works well...for a few months
customer_reviews.text: The first time this sharpener stopped working, I thought maybe my kid had dropped it or just something quirky was going on, so I bought it again. And now the second one has stopped working out of the blue. This is a great sharpener, the best we've used for our homeschool (to date), but I don't like how it just stops working for no reason. So I'm on to finding the next great sharpener that will hopefully last more than 3-6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Smith

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: The fact that this sharpener is so easy to take apart makes fixing it a breeze. I am a 2nd grade teacher, so one that is easy to fix is a necessity since odd things are put it in all the time. This sharpener also makes pencils SUPER sharp in a pretty short amount of time (no more than 10 seconds). Definitely the best bang for your buck for a sharpener!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Made my life easier
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to deal with the greatly increased consumption of pencils due to COVID-19 and remote schooling, and it has made my life much easier. Sharpens very quick, isn't too loud, and I like having the choice of battery or USB powered. I tested it when it first came in by running 20 pencils through it back to back, and it didn't overheat, shut off, or have any issues with sharpening.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer M

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly sharpens every time!
customer_reviews.text: We were using hand sharpeners for a while and it was a hassle. This was a welcome upgrade as my daughters are getting into colored pencils and writing in class. It's easy to use and works great. The auto stop function makes perfectly sharp pencils every time. We used it plugged in for a while but the freedom of using the batteries is a great feature. I highly recommend it if need a sharpener. They shipped it quickly and it arrived on time. Really great overall.
customer_reviews.author: JDubb

customer_reviews.title: Sketch Artists... this is the right sharpener for you!
customer_reviews.text: I use the HECK out of this thing. Gets pencil tips razor sharp. No more breaking the lead while sharpening. Has really helped me when sketching. I was wasting so much lead and sharpening things over and over before I got this. I highly recommend this one to artists.
customer_reviews.author: Joeldavid A. Lindow

customer_reviews.title: Love this sharpener
customer_reviews.text: This little sharpener is one of five electric ones we have tried over the last two years and thus far it is the hands down winner! Sharp points are easy to achieve and it’s small enough to have out without being in the way on my desk. Kids can use it correctly without help and its suoer easy to empty. I love that it plugs in instead of running thru batteries. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Trin

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken! Waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived broken. I studied it to see if I could figure out why it wasn't turning on, if it was something that could be fixed, but no joy. I tried a power cord from the same product purchased on another occasion, but that didn't work either. So definitely the sharpener and not the power cord. It's so disappointing when things arrive broken. What a Waste of money and time!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Hasanali

customer_reviews.title: I changed my mind
customer_reviews.text: My first review of this product was less than stellar but after being contacted by the seller where they informed me that they wanted me to be happy and assumed that I must of had a rare faulty product they sent me another one no questions asked. The new one my daughter and I put though the tests by finding as many pencils as we could throughout the house and all of them sharpened perfectly with out any problems. I’m very happy
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Shackleford 7622189

customer_reviews.title: Sharpens Unevenly
customer_reviews.text: As a teacher, I'm searching for the pencil sharpener that delivers an even point. Unfortunately, this one does not. I have tried "good" pencils and "cheap" pencils and get the same results - lead on one side, wood still on the other.
customer_reviews.author: PDG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pencil every time!
customer_reviews.text: Stops sharpening when it has the perfect tip every time. Honestly the best $20 I’ve ever spent. My kids lose (or breaks) every single pencil sharper I have ever bought them. They ain’t touching this GEM!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get The Type That You Can  Remove the Tray Only
customer_reviews.text: When you have to empty it out or remove a particle that's stuck, you have to take the entire thing apart. Once I took it apart to empty it, it wouldn't work anymore. I bought a new sharpener that I pull the tray out from the bottom. You don't have to take the whole thing out and put it all together piece by piece perfectly so that it will work. I bought a more expensive one but I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not sharpen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pencil sharpener to sharpen my colored pencils, which it says that it is suitable for. The sharpener does not run smoothly, and does not auto-stop when the pencil is sharp. I have to either press too hard to get it to start att all, or it stops without the pencil being even remotly sharp. One of my pencil brands does not fit in the sharpener even though it fits other 8 mm sharpeners. The problems are the same if I use a graphite pencil or a colored pencil. I am sad to say this is not working the way I had hoped after having read the other reviews here! :(
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Ågren

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: This worked great initially but completely stopped working just under 2 years old. Tried the power cord and changed out batteries and still nothing. It was just average home use. I would think something like this would last longer, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: jello

customer_reviews.title: Great little pencil sharpener
customer_reviews.text: The sharpener is small and compact. My old electric sharpener was at least 20 years old and still worked but technology has come a long way. I love that I can sharpen my colored pencils and also that it stops automatically when the point is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: PIH5

customer_reviews.title: I Like This Pencil Sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Someone else said that the point was weird. Yes, it is a little strange. Yet, this sharpener works well and is plenty powerful even when running on batteries. I like the way it completely stops when the pencil is sharpened - no guesswork. Anyone who puts a lot of pressure on their writing instrument might break the point, but others should be fine using this product.
customer_reviews.author: MAB

customer_reviews.title: You should buy this sharpener!
customer_reviews.text: After my X-acto brand sharpener stopped working, I tried this one as a replacement due to the positive reviews. This did not disappoint! It sharpens so well! Also, since the hole is on the top, all my kids (ages 3 to 8) can manage using it without the sharpener moving around on the desk (like with a front-load sharpener). It is also easy to empty, which is another bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Lego Nurse Mama

customer_reviews.title: Not worth
customer_reviews.text: Inserted brand new batteries & tried. Nothing happened to the pencil. It remained the way it was inserted. The unit just kept making sounds. Though the pencil kept turning, it did not sharpen at all. Produced only very few minute shavings, that's all...Not worth, try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Syam

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK RIGHT OUT OF THE BOX....
customer_reviews.text: The pencil sharpener DID NOT WORK right out of the box!!! Put batteries in... tried 3 different plugs, took batteries out... tried a different power cord block to see if that was the issue?! It does not work, extremely annoying and disappointing!!! WIll be returned!!!
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this sharpener. I needed a good quality one in my art studio where it gets used constantly. Blade is very sharp and pencils/colored pencils are sharpened in seconds, with auto stop so that lead does not break from over sharpening. 3 power sources - battery, USB port or adapter to plug in. Clear top half of unit allows you to see when to empty shavings and is easy to open, portable so it can be used anywhere, quiet, and designed well so that it does not tip over. I even like the blue color. Well worth the money I paid for the unit, and would recommend it to anyone who wants a good, strong sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Palimas

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Changes to 5 stars for customer service. They’ve contacted me quite a bit regarding replacing or refunding this pencil sharpener. I will be getting a refund and they have since changed manufactures of the product, is what they have told me. Great customer service. I’d be willing to deal with the company again Original: It slowly died. Only got a few good sharpeninga out of it.
customer_reviews.author: stentzs

customer_reviews.title: Sharpens Pencils
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well so far. It sharpens the pencils, which is its job. Stops so it doesn’t over-sharpen. Has a small capacity so it will need to be emptied frequently. Also even high school students need to be taught how to properly sharpen their pencils so as to not break the device (that’s more of a human issue, not a device issue). I can foresee a student breaking it while turning the pencil while it’s sharpening or by jamming it when they move the pencil in and out while it sharpens.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but a little small
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Works great - Load on the top so kids have a easy time using it - Sharpens well so far - Can be battery operated or adapter is included Cons: - Capacity is a little small so you have to empty more often - Lid to dump out the shavings is hard to get back on
customer_reviews.author: BettieBoop77

customer_reviews.title: Strong motor , quick , might be difficult  for a child.
customer_reviews.text: This device is light and compact. Seems pretty sturdy and it sharpens fairly quickly. However, being that is very light you have to hold it otherwise it will spin with the pencil. My 5 year old had a difficult time pushing down hard on the pencil and holding it down to keep it from spinning. I had to 3d print a cute holder for additional support to keep it from spinning.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Super Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This thing is terrific at sharpening pencils. The sharpest pencils I have ever seen from a battery-operated sharpener. Unfortunately, this item does NOT work while plugged in. The plug is loose at several points: where it connects to the sharpener, where the USB plugs into the plug and where the plug goes into the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsie

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Since I bought this sharper, my son has been sharpening boxes of pencils - just for sport! He likes that it is very easy to use and sharpens pencils pretty quickly. The bin holds a lot of shavings and is easy to empty - and I love that when you remove the lid it will not work should you stick a pencil ( or a finger) in. And the 12 month warranty as well as the main options to power it with made me choose this model over others. The only problem with it is if my son wanted to use it at school it is too loud.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous pencil sharpener

customer_reviews.title: Company resolved issue - good customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the sharpener has a USB cord. It was easy to plug in and use. Loved that when the pencil was sharp it would turn off automatically. Opened it on Christmas Day and used it for a little over a month. Now the adapter has stopped working, but we can still get it to work by plugging into a computer with the USB connector or using batteries. Update: the company reached out to me and offered to send me a new pencil sharpener to replace the bad adapter. Nice customer service.
customer_reviews.author: msb

customer_reviews.title: Love this, gets the point super sharp if you want (adjustable)
customer_reviews.text: There are no instructions on how to make the point more fine, but in my typical fashion, I messed with it until I figured it out. It's literally the sharpest pencil tip I have ever seen. Perfect for detailed coloring-in. I like that it powers by USB, power outlet, or batteries -- all the parts come in the box that are needed to power it any way you'd like. Well, not the batteries, but the cords. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cat's Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this because my little one always uses pencils a lot and I got tired of pencils sharpening by myself. The device works well, does not break graphite, powerful and the container holds a lot of rasping. Also it can run on batteries, but I use it "stationary" with the provided power supply. My daughter (6 y.o.) always uses it, and she enjoys the sharpening process :) Strongly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy

customer_reviews.title: Defective - do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This pencil sharpener works just fine about 25% of the time. Otherwise, it sits and does nothing and resolutely refuses to sharpen a pencil. I bought this because it was Amazon-recommended, but it is very poor in that it does not work most of the time. If you need a pencil sharpener, go elsewhere. I am going to a stationery store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak pencil sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I must have gotten two bad ones because this sharpener is not working for me. It’ll sharpen okay one moment, then next pencil it just dies and I have it plugged into a wall outlet with the adapter. And it’s not as if we sharpen a large volume of pencils, just a pencil or two a day. I just threw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Moni Thoms

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It's a fantastic product. I have not ran into any issues and intend to use it for a long while to come. The product comes with a USB cable and Switching Power Supply, which I attach to near my desk b/c that's where I usually do my work anyways. My last electric sharpener ran on battery-which came with the problem of battery acid leakage and corroding the conductors. So I highly recommend using the cable, extending product longevity (and saves money on having to buy batteries every so often).
customer_reviews.author: Thanh Phung

customer_reviews.title: JUNK! (But read my update)
customer_reviews.text: We got about 6 uses out of this sharpener before it failed. Don't wast your money. We had to throw it out as the 30 return policy expired. Update. The customer service is excellent! After this review, they contacted me and advised that the product has a lifetime warranty and I could get a refund or replacement. They refunded my monies immediately.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service. Original item malfunctioned.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly fast customer service response to issue. Received replacement item less than 24 hours after they received our address. This sharpener seemed pretty strong early on. It sharpened as advertised for about four months. Then, it started to glitch during sharpening where you had to let the pencil twist a little to let it continue. Now it’s completely useless and won’t do anything. Seems like the motor is worn down already. Follow up: very quickly after creating this review, Jarlink customer service reached out and told us that their product had a lifetime warranty and offering us a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof6under10

customer_reviews.title: The best pencil sharpener I ever had!
customer_reviews.text: So convenient and easy to use! Pop in the pencil, hold it and in a second you can carry on coloring. Super time and energy saver. No broken leads. Stops when done, or you can just pop it in to sharpen a slightly dull point. The only problem is that it the opening is rather small. The Faber Castell Polychromos colored pencils just make it into the opening.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Vosloo

customer_reviews.title: Let’s Get Right to the Point
customer_reviews.text: This pencil sharpener sharpens to the sharpest point that I have ever seen. I would give it 5 stars, but I am not convinced of its durability. I am a school teacher and have it in my classroom. It’s durability will certainly be tested. After writing this review, the sharpener broke after about two weeks use. There was no abuse to it that I observed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ed

customer_reviews.title: Cool sharpener with auto stop
customer_reviews.text: This pencil sharpener likes very cool, not in cheap shape at all. I tested on some pencils and it turned out that this sharpener works really great. Each pencil was sharpened quickly and elegantly. The pencil tip is very sharp. But that's actually my down size since I want it to be dull a little bit. Overall, I am satisfied with this sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Pencil sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pencil sharpener and it did not work. I emailed the company directly and they immediately sent me a replacement pencil sharpener. The product works as expected and produces a very sharp pencil point. I am satisfied and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: E Crumbia

customer_reviews.title: Party Ruiner! No auto stop nor sharpness.
customer_reviews.text: There's a great pencil sharpener at work and I thought it I had one at home people would think I was successful. So I bought this one and invited people over. To my great surprise no one even noticed it except for the one guy I don't like and he tried using it and it didn't even sharpen the pencil. He made a joke about it which mortified me. Now I'm returning it. See video as demonstration of what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: excellent value, excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I sharpened dozens and dozens of dull colored pencils in 20 mins! Previously I had spent an hour hand sharpening and got blisters doing so. This is one of the better electric sharpeners I have bought over the years as it did not overheat and shut off after 5 mins use. Easy to empty. Super fast sharpening too! Just a few seconds and you have a sharp pencil!
customer_reviews.author: 4krob

product_meta.title: JARLINK Electric Pencil Sharpener, Heavy-duty Helical Blade to Fast Sharpen, Auto Stop for No.2/Colored Pencils(6-8mm), USB/Battery Operated in School Classroom/Office/Home (Black)
feature_bullets: 【Powerful Motor】With heavy-duty and durable helical blade, fast sharpening for 5-10 seconds and auto-stop working at a perfect point to protect pencil lead and dispose of the broken lead intelligently. Fit for sharpening #2 pencils, colored pencils, charcoal pencils, etc.

【Auto & Safety Features】 Automatically work when plugging the pencil into the shaving entrance. Auto-stop working if finished or the lid is opened. 8mm diameters shaving entrance could prevent kids' fingers from entering to avoid hurting.

【Multiple Power Sources】Powered by 4 AA batteries (Batteries NOT Included) or AC. Flexible and convenient to use anywhere and easy to carry around. (Power Supply: input 100-240V, output 6.0V/1500mA or 4 AA alkaline batteries)
【Large Capacity Design】Large capacity shavings reservoir can hold a lot of shavings. Scraps will not fall out easily when the top open lid is closed. It could sharpen your pencil over 3,000 times.
【Easy to Clean】Open the cover of the reservoir to pour out the pencil shavings when finished, not adding too much trouble. Please contact JARLINK support if there are any problems during the use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars4,663 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
